code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatBox=()=>{const[prompt,setPrompt]=useState("");const[response,setResponse]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleAsk=async()=>{setLoading(true);setResponse("");try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/ask",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({prompt})});const data=await res.json();if(data.response){setResponse(data.response);}else{setResponse("Error: "+data.error);}}catch(err){setResponse("Error connecting to server.");}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chatbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Ask a question or paste your notes...",value:prompt,onChange:e=>setPrompt(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAsk,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Asking...":"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"response",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Response:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:response})]})]});};export default ChatBox;
